metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35535 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibRaw, there is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the "LibRaw::parseSonySRF()" function (libraw\src\metadata\sony.cpp) when processing srf files.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
